channel.title: ScanX – Corporate Actions
channel.description: Auto-generated feed for ScanX Corporate Actions

item.title: Orchasp Limited Receives In-Principle Approval for ₹8.60 Crore Preferential Allotment
item.description: Top News Orchasp Limited Receives In-Principle Approval for ₹8.60 Crore Preferential Allotment 10 hours ago Orchasp Limited has received in-principle approval from BSE and NSE for allotment of 2,68,75,000 equity shares worth ₹8,60,00,000 through preferential allotment to promoters for loan conversion. The approvals come with strict compliance requirements including internal control strengthening and specific trading restrictions for allottees. The company must complete listing formalities within twenty days of allotment to avoid penalties.

item.title: Shri Gang Industries Receives Credit Rating Upgrade from Infomerics
item.description: Shri Gang Industries Receives Credit Rating Upgrade from Infomerics 11 hours ago Shri Gang Industries and Allied Products Limited received a credit rating upgrade from Infomerics on December 12, 2025, with long-term bank facilities rating improved from IVR BBB-/Stable to IVR BBB/Stable. The facility limit was enhanced from ₹22.90 crores to ₹26.90 crores, representing a ₹4.00 crore increase. The upgrade demonstrates improved creditworthiness and provides enhanced access to capital for the company's operations.

item.title: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Climb Over 0.5% in Positive Close
item.description: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Climb Over 0.5% in Positive Close 17 hours ago Indian markets closed positively on December 12, with Nifty 50 breaching 26,000 and Sensex surpassing 85,000. The session saw a broad-based rally with 61% of traded stocks advancing. InterGlobe Aviation clarified no SEBI investigation and disclosed a CGST penalty. Infosys witnessed significant promoter share sales.

item.title: Excelsoft Technologies Q2 Results: EBIT Surges 180% with Margin Expansion
item.description: Excelsoft Technologies Q2 Results: EBIT Surges 180% with Margin Expansion 12 hours ago Excelsoft Technologies reported outstanding Q2 financial performance with EBIT jumping 180.49% to ₹115 million and EBIT margin more than doubling to 17.80% from 7.36%. The company also achieved 79.66% growth in consolidated profit to ₹106 million and 15.98% revenue growth to ₹646 million, demonstrating exceptional operational leverage and margin expansion.
